This is a maven based project.

If you don't know about maven, you can read about it at http://maven.apache.org/

How do you install this extension?

 # Check out the source code
 # At the root of the project, run "mvn clean package"
 # Copy customise-site-logo-alfresco/target/customise-site-alfresco-{VERSION}.jar to {TOMCAT_HOME}/webapps/alfresco/WEB_INF/lib
 # For Alfresco 3.x, copy customise-site-logo-share-3/target/customise-site-share-{VERSION}.jar to {TOMCAT_HOME}/webapps/share/WEB_INF/lib
 # For Alfresco 4.0.x, copy customise-site-logo-share-40x/target/customise-site-share-{VERSION}-jar-with-dependencies.jar to {TOMCAT_HOME}/webapps/share/WEB_INF/lib
 # For Alfresco 4.1.x, copy customise-site-logo-share-41x/target/customise-site-share-{VERSION}-jar-with-dependencies.jar to {TOMCAT_HOME}/webapps/share/WEB_INF/lib
 # For Alfresco 4.2, copy customise-site-logo-share-42/target/customise-site-share-{VERSION}.jar to {TOMCAT_HOME}/webapps/share/WEB_INF/lib
